item.text: Then in the month of Nisan, in the twentieth year of King Artaxerxes, when wine was brought to me, I took the wine and gave it to the king. Previously I had not been depressed in the king’s presence.
So the king said to me, “Why do you appear to be depressed when you aren’t sick? What can this be other than sadness of heart?” This made me very fearful.
I replied to the king, “O king, live forever! Why would I not appear dejected when the city with the graves of my ancestors lies desolate and its gates destroyed by fire?”

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">responded</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="05921 04100">What</st> is <st data-num="02088" class="">it</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="01245" class="">seeking</st>?” Then I quickly <st data-num="06419" class="">prayed</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="08064" class="">heaven</st>

and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, “<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> is <st data-num="05921" class="">so</st> <st data-num="02895" class="">inclined</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> has <st data-num="03190" class="">found favor</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">in</st> your <st data-num="06440" class="">sight</st>, <st data-num="0834 07971">dispatch</st> me <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>, <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> with the <st data-num="06913" class="">graves</st> of my <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st>, so that I can <st data-num="01129" class="">rebuild</st> it.”

Then the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, with his <st data-num="07694" class="">consort</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03427" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="0681" class="">beside</st> him, <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="05704" class="">How</st> <st data-num="04970" class="">long</st> would your <st data-num="04109" class="">trip</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">take</st>, and <st data-num="04970" class="">when</st> would you <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st>?” Since <st data-num="06440 04428">the king</st> was <st data-num="03190">pleased</st> to <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> me,<n id="2" /> I <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> him a <st data-num="02165" class="">time</st>.

I <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, “<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> is <st data-num="05921" class="">so</st> <st data-num="02895" class="">inclined</st>, let him <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> me <st data-num="0107" class="">letters</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="06346" class="">governors</st> of <st data-num="05676" class="">Trans</st>-<st data-num="05104" class="">Euphrates</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> will enable me to <st data-num="05674" class="">travel</st> safely <st data-num="05704 0834">until</st> I <st data-num="0935 0413">reach</st> <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>,

and a <st data-num="0107" class="">letter</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">for</st> <st data-num="0623" class="">Asaph</st> the <st data-num="08104" class="">keeper</st> of the <st data-num="0834 04428">king’s</st> <st data-num="06508" class="">nature preserve</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">so that</st> he will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> me <st data-num="06086" class="">timber</st> for <st data-num="07136" class="">beams for</st> the <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st> of the <st data-num="01002" class="">fortress</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">adjacent</st> to the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> and for the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="02346" class="">wall</st><n id="2" /> and for the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> I <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st>.” So the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">granted</st> me these requests,<n id="3" /> for the <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> of my <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> was <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> me.

Then I <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="06346" class="">governors</st> of <st data-num="05676" class="">Trans</st>-<st data-num="05104" class="">Euphrates</st>, and I <st data-num="05414" class="">presented</st> to them the <st data-num="0107" class="">letters</st> from the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>. The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> had <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> me <st data-num="08269" class="">officers</st> of the <st data-num="02428" class="">army</st> and <st data-num="06571" class="">horsemen</st>.
When Sanballat the Horonite and Tobiah the Ammonite official heard all this, they were very displeased that someone had come to seek benefit for the Israelites.
So I came to Jerusalem. When I had been there for three days,

<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">got up</st> during the <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st>, along with a <st data-num="04592" class="">few</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> who were <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> me. But I did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05046" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="0120" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="04100" class="">what</st> my <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> was <st data-num="05414" class="">putting</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> my <st data-num="03820" class="">heart</st> to <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> for <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>. There were <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> <st data-num="0929" class="">animals</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> me, <st data-num="03588 0518">except for</st> the <st data-num="0929 0834">one</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> was <st data-num="07392" class="">riding</st>.

I <st data-num="03318" class="">proceeded</st> through the <st data-num="01516" class="">Valley</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">Gate</st> by <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st>, <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="06440" class="">direction</st> of the <st data-num="05869" class="">Well</st> of the <st data-num="08577" class="">Dragons</st><n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="0830" class="">Dung</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">Gate</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01961 07663">inspecting</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="02346" class="">walls</st> of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> had been <st data-num="06555" class="">breached</st> and its <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st> that had been <st data-num="0398" class="">destroyed</st> by <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>.

I <st data-num="05674" class="">passed on</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="08179" class="">Gate</st> of the <st data-num="05869" class="">Well</st> and the <st data-num="04428" class="">King’s</st> <st data-num="01295" class="">Pool</st>, where <st data-num="0369" class="">there was not</st> enough <st data-num="04725" class="">room</st> for my <st data-num="0929" class="">animal</st> to <st data-num="05674" class="">pass</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">with</st> me.

I <st data-num="01961" class="">continued</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">up</st> the <st data-num="05158" class="">valley</st> during the <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st>, <st data-num="01961 07663">inspecting</st> the <st data-num="02346" class="">wall</st>. Then I <st data-num="07725" class="">turned back</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> to the <st data-num="01516" class="">Valley</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">Gate</st>, and so <st data-num="07725" class="">returned</st>.

The <st data-num="05461" class="">officials</st> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="0575" class="">where</st> I had <st data-num="01980" class="">gone</st> or <st data-num="04100" class="">what</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> had been <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st>, for <st data-num="05704" class="">up to</st> <st data-num="03651" class="">this point</st> I had <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05046" class="">told</st> any of the <st data-num="03064" class="">Jews</st> or the <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> or the <st data-num="02715" class="">nobles</st> or the <st data-num="05461" class="">officials</st> or the <st data-num="03499" class="">rest</st> of the <st data-num="06213 04399">workers</st>.

Then I <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, “<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="07451" class="">problem</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0587" class="">we</st> have—<st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="02717" class="">is desolate</st> and its <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st> are <st data-num="03341 0784">burned</st>. <st data-num="01980" class="">Come on</st>! Let’s <st data-num="01129" class="">rebuild</st> the <st data-num="02346" class="">wall</st> of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> so that this <st data-num="02781" class="">reproach</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01961 05750">continue</st>.”

Then I <st data-num="05046" class="">related</st> to them how the <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> of my <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="0834 01931">was</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> me <st data-num="0637" class="">and</st> <st data-num="01697">what</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> had <st data-num="0834 0559">said</st> to me. Then they <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “Let’s <st data-num="06965" class="">begin</st> <st data-num="01129" class="">rebuilding</st> right away!”<n id="2" /> So they <st data-num="02388" class="">readied</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">themselves</st><n id="3" /> for this <st data-num="02896" class="">good project</st>.

But when <st data-num="05571" class="">Sanballat</st> the <st data-num="02772" class="">Horonite</st>, <st data-num="02900" class="">Tobiah</st> the <st data-num="05984" class="">Ammonite</st> <st data-num="05650" class="">official</st>, and <st data-num="01654" class="">Geshem</st> the <st data-num="06163" class="">Arab</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> all this,<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="03932" class="">derided</st> us and <st data-num="0959" class="">expressed contempt</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">toward</st> us. They <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> is <st data-num="01697 02088 0834">this</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st>? Are <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="04775" class="">rebelling</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>?”
I responded to them by saying, “The God of heaven will prosper us. We his servants will start the rebuilding. But you have no just or ancient right in Jerusalem.”
